Docs.param: The minimum number of rows to return.
to indicate that the returned data is sample data; to indicate that the returned data is live data.
Docs.summary: Gets the design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control by using the specified number of rows. Returns a value that indicates whether the data is sample or real data.
